enhanced_by.reason: The parseFragment method relies on initializing a TreeBuilder, which is similar to the initialization required by other parsing methods.
Both methods parse input strings and require similar setup, such as initializing a TreeBuilder and setting a base URI.
Setting up the environment, including initializing the TreeBuilder and setting the base URI, is required before parsing fragments.
The parseBodyFragment method may need to be invoked before parseFragment to ensure the correct context and environment setup.
